thread.title: Garden Grill Restaurant Introduces Breakfast and Lunch
thread.title_full: Garden Grill Restaurant Introduces Breakfast and Lunch

author: Off to Neverland Travel
title: Garden Grill Restaurant Introduces Breakfast and Lunch
text:
Garden Grill Restaurant Introduces Breakfast and Lunch 
This fall, character dining options inside Epcot® are expanding! 
Starting Nov. 8, 2015, The Garden Grill Restaurant inside the Land Pavilion of Epcot® will offer breakfast and lunch reservations daily. While the complete breakfast menu has yet to be released, you can expect many breakfast favorites like biscuits and gravy, scrambled eggs, crispy bacon, Mickey waffles, and Chip’s Sticky Bun Bake. For lunch, you’ll find favorites from their dinner menu like sliced filet of beef, roasted slice turkey, “Living with the Land” Harvest-inspired Farmer’s Salad, and various side dishes. Just like dinner, the two new meals will be served all-you-care-to-eat right at your table. And of course, Chip ‘n’ Dale and some of their Disney pals will make rounds all day long greeting guests. Bookings are open now, so be sure to contact   place you dining request or for additional information.
